root.name: Homie Rollerz
root.description: Overview This is a kart racing game where you play as one of 10 Homies. You earn respect points by winning races and performing stunts, which can be cashed in to customize your "ride". There is also multiplayer available.Â ReceptionNamed "Dud of the Year" for 2008 by Metacritic for getting the lowest metascore of any game that year.
